nextBestActions.label: 1. Recommend & Take Payment
nextBestActions.tooltip: Due to your past due balance and active collection activity, we can take a payment over the phone or over the web to get your account caught up. Can you make your payment?

nextBestActions.label: 2. Recommend AutoPay
nextBestActions.tooltip: We recommend enrolling in AutoPay to have your utility bill paid automatically each month — securely, on time, and without the hassle of remembering due dates. It’s a simple way to stay current, avoid late fees, and enjoy peace of mind.

nextBestActions.label: 3. Payment Arrangement - Not Eligible (1 Active)
nextBestActions.tooltip: Payment Extension may be offered, no Payment Arrangement is not allowed at this time, due to 1 arrangement currently active. Recommend making payment in full as soon as possible. Inquire if qualifies for Low Income Assistance.
